scripts.prepare-inpage: tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && node --enable-source-maps ../app/inpage/js/prepare.mjs && node --input-type=module -e "import { promises as fs } from 'fs'; await fs.rm('../app/inpage/js/prepare.mjs')"
scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run prepare-inpage && tsc --project output_tsconfig.json
